TextEng: "I think we need to part ways."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I don't want you to cast any spells until I say otherwise."
Text: "내가 달리 말하기 전까지는 주문을 사용하지 마."

TextEng: "I want you to go ahead and cast spells on your own."
"Do not try to use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "파티원의 무력화 효과를 제거하는 데 주문 해제 마법을 사용하지 마."

TextEng: "Use dispel magic spells to remove disabling effects from party members."
Text: "파티원의 무력화 효과를 제거하는 데 주문 해제 마법을 사용해."

TextEng: "I want you to leave any traps that you see alone for now."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
Text: "은신 상태를 유지해. 단, 다음 전투 전까지만."

TextEng: "Try to remain stealthy all the time."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "자물쇠나 상자를 여는 데 실패해도 도와주지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
"I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
Text: "날 방어하고 내가 공격하기 전까지는 공격하지 마."

TextEng: "I want you to use your bard song now."
"I need you to cast a group of buffing spells."
"Cast all the buffing spells you have."
"Cast all the buffing spells that last a long time."
Text: "지속 시간이 긴 버프 주문을 모두 걸어줘."

TextEng: "Cast all the short duration buffing spells."
Text: "지속 시간이 짧은 버프 주문을 모두 걸어줘."

TextEng: "I need you to cast a spell."
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"I'm just wondering how everything is going with you."
"I want you to do whatever you like, Deekin."
"I want you to focus on being a bard."
"I'm wondering... what do you plan to do once this adventure is done?"
Text: "궁금한데... 이 모험이 끝나면 뭘 할 계획이야?"

TextEng: "You damn well better get a better price."
Text: "더 좋은 가격을 받는 게 좋을 거야."

TextEng: "Don't you want to stay with me?"
"That seems like a very odd thing to do."
"You want your tribe to live in civilized lands? Why?"
Text: "부족을 문명화된 땅에서 살게 하고 싶다고? 왜?"

TextEng: "Whatever works for you. Just keep the crazy to yourself."
Text: "네게 맞는 걸 해. 미친 짓은 혼자 해."

TextEng: "Well... let's concentrate on finishing this adventure, first."
Text: "음... 일단 이 모험을 끝내는 데 집중하자."

TextEng: "If there's anything I can do to help..."
"Do you think you can really make them change?"
Text: "정말 그들을 변화시킬 수 있을 것 같아?"

TextEng: "This isn't like the time you met a dragon, is it?"
"A drow elf? In Waterdeep? Are you sure?"
"Drippits? That doesn't sound like much of a drow name."
"He went to Hilltop to eat pie?"
"What about the Gold dragon? What did he want?"
"So that's your story about meeting another dragon?"
"Err... I can't help but notice that you've grown wings..."
"But red is much cooler than white."
"You seem a bit different from when I first met you."
Text: "처음 만났을 때와 좀 달라진 것 같은데."

TextEng: "You damn well better not mean it, kobold."
"Just make sure you control these urges, Deekin."
"If it makes you stronger, I'm all for it."
"You could certainly afford to be stronger..."
"Not really. Where do you think it could lead?"
"Go ahead and become a dragon disciple, if you can."
"I could really use a bard, actually."
"I can't tell you what to do, Deekin."
Text: "네가 뭘 해야 할지 내가 말해줄 수는 없어, 디킨."

TextEng: "What happened to you after we parted ways last time?"
"You could have come looking for me, you know."
"I had a copy of your book, actually."
Text: "사실 네 책 한 권 가지고 있었어."

TextEng: "How much coin are we talking about?"
"Some of that should have been mine."
"Hmph. If you weren't such an idiot, that wouldn't have happened."
Text: "흥. 네가 바보가 아니었다면 그런 일은 일어나지 않았을 거야."

TextEng: "You let them walk all over you?"
"What were you expecting? You're a kobold."
"I don't know what to say. That's horrible."
"Alright, whatever. Let's just move on, shall we?"
"I have complete faith in you, Deekin."
"So why didn't you kick some butt? You're no weakling."
Text: "그럼 왜 혼쭐을 내주지 않았어? 넌 약하지 않잖아."

TextEng: "'Little Deekin' fights by my side against powerful monsters."
Text: "'꼬마 디킨'은 내 곁에서 강력한 괴물들과 싸우고 있잖아."

TextEng: "You're a powerful bard by any standard, Deekin."
"It sounds like you had a difficult time."
"That's it? I remember the book being quite successful."
Text: "그게 다야? 책이 꽤 성공적이었던 걸로 기억하는데."

TextEng: "I'll ask you about it later, perhaps."
"Tell me what you know about him, then."
"What happened since then? Do you know?"
"How was Waterdeep able to grow over top of Undermountain?"
Text: "워터딥은 어떻게 언더마운틴 위에 세워질 수 있었어?"

TextEng: "So all these monsters were originally in Undermountain?"
Text: "그럼 이 모든 괴물들이 원래 언더마운틴에 있었던 거야?"

TextEng: "Undermountain doesn't look like a dwarven mine, though."
"What had happened to all the dwarves?"
"Why did he disappear into the mines?"
"Just how long ago was this, anyway?"
"There's a tower? Is it still in Waterdeep?"
"Well, I hope you learned a lesson."
"We're not friends, kobold. Keep it straight."
Text: "우린 친구 사이가 아니야, 코볼트. 착각하지 마."

TextEng: "Really? I think of you as more of a henchman."
"Awww... that's very sweet of you to say, Deekin."
"You've earned your place beside me, Deekin."
Text: "넌 내 곁에 있을 자격을 얻었어, 디킨."

TextEng: "Who else is going to write my tale?"
"You do know how powerful you are now, right?"
"I think of you as a great friend, too."
"No, go ahead... what did you want to say?"
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "It's okay, Deekin. You can tell me."
"You must have some ideas of your own."
"Won't your publisher just change the name on you again?"
"Call it anything but 'Hordes of the Underdark'."
"I really wish you wouldn't put me in your book."
Text: "정말 네 책에 날 넣지 않았으면 좋겠어."

TextEng: "Write what you want, and leave me be."
Text: "네가 원하는 대로 써. 그리고 날 좀 내버려둬."

TextEng: "Describe me however you think best, Deekin."
"More along that vein would work, I think."
Text: "그런 식으로 더 쓰면 될 것 같아."

TextEng: "You don't need to compliment me. Just tell the truth."
Text: "날 칭찬할 필요 없어. 그냥 사실대로 말해."

TextEng: "Of course I remember Tymofarrar. Last I heard he was still as blase as ever."
Text: "물론 티모파라르를 기억해. 마지막으로 들었을 땐 여전히 무덤덤하더라."

TextEng: "He talked about you with affection... sort of..."
Text: "그가 애정을 담아 너에 대해 말했어... 어느 정도는..."

TextEng: "No, but it would be nice if you did."
"He said you have dragon blood? Was he joking?"
"Maybe the potential is there. You never know."
Text: "잠재력은 있을지도 몰라. 알 수 없는 거지."

TextEng: "No, he didn't, so get over it already."
"That was a long time ago, Deekin."
"Tymofarrar? Of course. I remember killing him, too."
"Err... the white dragon? Not really... it's been a long time."
"Big deal. Keep the sob story to yourself."
Text: "별일도 아닌 걸 가지고. 신파라면 혼자 간직해."

TextEng: "I'm sorry things didn't work out, Deekin."
"And that's the saddest thing I've heard all day."
Text: "그게 오늘 들은 것 중 가장 슬픈 얘기네."

TextEng: "I think that probably would have happened anywhere."
"What were you expecting, Deekin? You're a kobold."
"You lived in caves and you never saw a drow?"
Text: "동굴에 살면서 드로우를 한 번도 못 봤어?"

TextEng: "Ugh... I didn't need to know that..."
"Quite a bit. I am an elf, after all."
"You do know that a drow is a type of elf, right?"
"That's the dumbest idea I've ever heard."
Text: "내가 들어본 것 중 가장 멍청한 생각이야."

TextEng: "That's a good idea. Change your name."
"Think about it. I'm sure you'll come up with something."
"Don't you have any favorite names, Deekin?"
"I think Deekin is a fine name."
"Who? Oh... my mentor. No, not at all."
"Are you joking? He was an old fool, no more."
Text: "농담이야? 그냥 늙은 바보였어, 그 이상 아니야."

TextEng: "Drogan sacrificed himself nobly. I will always cherish his memory."
Text: "드로건은 고결하게 희생했어. 항상 그의 기억을 소중히 할 거야."

TextEng: "My old mentor? Perhaps a little, sometimes."
"But you have a whole life of adventure now. Isn't that what you wanted?"
Text: "하지만 이제 모험으로 가득한 삶을 살잖아. 네가 원했던 거 아니야?"

TextEng: "If you want something we find, let me know."
Text: "우리가 찾은 것 중 원하는 게 있으면 말해."

TextEng: "You'll get what I give you, no more."
Text: "내가 주는 것만 받아, 그 이상은 없어."

TextEng: "What? You don't trust me to give you a fair share?"
Text: "뭐? 내가 공정하게 나눠줄 거라고 믿지 못해?"

TextEng: "Dibs? No I don't think that would work."
Text: "먼저 찜하기? 아니, 그건 안 될 것 같은데."

TextEng: "You're my scribe and sometimes you're handy... at best."
Text: "넌 내 서기이고 가끔 쓸모 있어... 기껏해야."

TextEng: "We are friends, Deekin. That's better than being an adventurer."
Text: "우린 친구야, 디킨. 모험가보다 더 좋은 거지."

TextEng: "Right. Just remember to write it all down."
"The Reaper has always referred to it as his realm, nothing else."
"I don't know what the Reaper is, Deekin. A demon, perhaps? He just is."
Text: "사신이 뭔지 모르겠어, 디킨. 악마일까? 그냥 존재하는 거지."

TextEng: "I have to pay his price, first, but basically yes."
"Er... usually. There's some explanation to how this works, but I don't know much about it."
Text: "어... 보통은. 어떻게 작동하는지 설명이 있긴 한데, 잘 모르겠어."

TextEng: "This place is a nexus, or so the Reaper says. I'm not sure I understand it all."
Text: "사신 말로는 이곳이 경계 영역이래. 다 이해하는 건 아니야."

TextEng: "The Reaper says his realm is a nexus. It connects to many places, but not all."
Text: "사신이 자신의 영역은 경계 영역이라고 해. 많은 곳과 연결되지만 전부는 아니야."

TextEng: "Silence, kobold. I'm not in the mood."
"Unless you can think of some way out of here, shut it."
Text: "여기서 나갈 방법을 생각해낼 게 아니면 닥쳐."

TextEng: "Is there anything about this place you can tell me?"
"Seems a bit... cold to be one of the Hells, doesn't it?"
"Well, let's keep going and see for ourselves, shall we?"
"There's no way to know this is the place you're talking about, Deekin."
Text: "네가 말하는 그곳이 여기인지 알 방법이 없어, 디킨."

TextEng: "Anything else interesting about the tale you recall?"
Text: "그 이야기에서 기억나는 다른 흥미로운 게 있어?"

TextEng: "Do you know why the city vanished?"
"Don't worry. I'm sure there's nothing in there for them to get excited about."
Text: "걱정 마. 거기에 그들이 흥분할 만한 건 없을 거야."

TextEng: "I think your thoughts may be a bit beyond their comprehension, Deekin."
Text: "네 생각은 그들이 이해하기엔 좀 어려울 것 같아, 디킨."

TextEng: "They are probably slaves or servants, Deekin."
"Enough with all these questions! It's time to act."
"They might keep slaves to work on it, too."
"They could always have one more if you keep blathering."
"No, I'm sure they just eat the kobolds."
"Why not? We've seen plenty of surface races down here."
Text: "왜 안 돼? 여기서 지상 종족들을 많이 봤잖아."

TextEng: "Don't care for your publisher, I see?"
"I guess we can all be glad you don't actually have one, then."
"We may find evidence of them if we look around."
Text: "주변을 둘러보면 증거를 찾을 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "How would a dead magic zone come to be, you think?"
Text: "마법 무효 지대는 어떻게 생긴 거라고 생각해?"

TextEng: "It shouldn't be that much of a problem. We'll be fine."
Text: "그렇게 큰 문제는 아닐 거야. 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "I agree. That would be a terrible existence."
"I really doubt that's how it is."
"You were stone, yourself. You tell me."
"I don't want to talk about that."
"I didn't feel anything when I was stone."
"Maybe. If we meet one, maybe we can ask it."
Text: "아마도. 하나 만나면 물어볼 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "If a golem thinks as much as you, we should be very frightened."
"It's a good thing you're not a golem, then."
"We don't know for sure, Deekin. They might be happy, too."
"I really don't want to hear about it, Deekin."
Text: "정말 그 얘기 듣고 싶지 않아, 디킨."

TextEng: "You're not afraid of water, are you?"
"I suppose you're right. I hadn't thought of it like that."
Text: "네 말이 맞는 것 같아. 그렇게 생각해본 적 없었어."

TextEng: "Enough, Deekin. I don't need to hear more of this prattle."
Text: "그만해, 디킨. 이런 잡담은 더 듣고 싶지 않아."

TextEng: "There's just as much water below the ground as above it, Deekin."
Text: "땅 밑에도 땅 위만큼 물이 많아, 디킨."

TextEng: "I know lots of things, Deekin. I'm smart."
Text: "난 많은 걸 알아, 디킨. 난 똑똑하거든."

TextEng: "I, uh, don't think it works quite like that..."
Text: "어, 그렇게 되는 건 아닌 것 같은데..."

TextEng: "I've never been on a ship, either."
"Since when is an adventure supposed to be safe?"
"Don't be such a coward. It's perfectly safe."
"You got me. I haven't a clue."
"You're not going to get all scared now, are you?"
"So we are. Do you know a way out of here that they didn't mention?"
Text: "그렇지. 그들이 말하지 않은 다른 출구를 알아?"

TextEng: "I know. I'm not very happy about that, either."
Text: "알아. 나도 그게 별로 마음에 안 들어."

TextEng: "Great. Wonderful. Let's move on, shall we?"
"Well, I'm glad to know someone's keeping things in perspective."
"Is that all you're concerned about? Your book?"
"And maybe I'll see some actual coin from *this* book...?"
Text: "그리고 아마 *이* 책에서는 실제로 돈을 좀 볼 수 있을지도...?"

TextEng: "You mean you're not scared to be in the Underdark at all?"
Text: "언더다크에 있는 게 전혀 무섭지 않다는 거야?"

TextEng: "Cool? We're going to be in constant danger?"
"Sometimes I just don't understand you at all, Deekin."
Text: "가끔은 널 정말 이해할 수가 없어, 디킨."

TextEng: "And where does that doorway go? Do you know?"
"That seems rather obvious, don't you think?"
"How much deeper does this dungeon go, anyway?"
Text: "이 던전이 대체 얼마나 더 깊은 거야?"

TextEng: "They could have great treasure, then, is what you're saying."
Text: "그럼 엄청난 보물이 있을 수도 있다는 거네."

TextEng: "Be silent. I've no need of your anecdotes."
"Yes, well, I'm sure we'll find out more soon enough."
"What if I don't look in the mirrors?"
"I can still get back up to the inn, can't I?"
"Then that's all I need to know."
"Do you know a lot about Undermountain, Deekin?"
"You're saying the Relic of the Reaper won't work?"
"Just make sure you tell me if you see anything else you recognize."
"You know a lot about Undermountain, do you?"
"Be watchful, then, and stay on guard."
"You've nothing to fear while you're with me."
Text: "나와 함께 있는 동안은 두려워할 게 없어."

TextEng: "Things have obviously changed in Undermountain since those books were written, Deekin."
Text: "책이 쓰인 이후로 언더마운틴에 많은 변화가 있었던 게 분명해, 디킨."
"아마 이 할라스터는 더 이상 여기 없을지도 몰라."

TextEng: "It means my patience with you is less than it normally is, kobold."
Text: "평소보다 네게 대한 인내심이 줄어들었다는 뜻이야, 코볼트."

TextEng: "It means we're in a very dangerous place."
"Of course I knew that, you stupid kobold!"
<StartAction>[Sigh.]</Start> "Yes, of course I knew where we were going, Deekin."
Text: <StartAction>[한숨.]</Start> "그래, 물론 어디로 가는지 알고 있었어, 디킨."

TextEng: "None whatsoever. I thought we were going to Rashaman to run naked in the fields."
Text: "전혀 몰랐지. 라셰맨에 가서 벌판을 벗고 뛰어다니는 줄 알았어."

TextEng: "That and eat kobold stew as a delicacy."
"Never mind. I don't want to discuss it."
"You came with me. Expect to die."
"Maybe you shouldn't go running off all the time."
"You're a tiny kobold and a bard. What were you expecting?"
"You keep dying. That's the real problem."
"Don't worry about it, Deekin. You're doing fine."
"Don't be so hard on her, Deekin. She does her best."
Text: "그렇게 심하게 대하지 마, 디킨. 최선을 다하고 있어."

TextEng: "That hurt like hell, you know. Vicious assault with a frying pan."
"Of course it's true. Never trust a drow."
Text: "당연히 사실이지. 드로우는 절대 믿으면 안 돼."

TextEng: "They are just like the shadows they inhabit. Dark and twisted."
"Well... perhaps not all of them. But most of them."
"If there are a few who aren't evil, they're rare exceptions."
Text: "악하지 않은 자가 있다면, 아주 드문 예외야."

TextEng: "Their entire race is evil. There's no getting away from it."
"Are we still talking about the drow?"
"I wouldn't get your hopes up, Deekin."
Text: "기대는 하지 않는 게 좋을 거야, 디킨."

TextEng: "You want to show them how to be good, Deekin?"
Text: "그들에게 선해지는 법을 가르쳐주고 싶은 거야, 디킨?"

TextEng: "You don't need anyone. You have to learn that."
"I think there might be other good kobolds out there, who knows?"
Text: "밖에 착한 코볼트가 더 있을지도 몰라, 누가 알겠어?"

TextEng: "I understand. I guess you're right, in a way."
Text: "이해해. 어떤 면에서는 네 말이 맞는 것 같아."

TextEng: "Possibly. They say that the famous Drizzt Do'Urden is a good drow."
Text: "아마도. 유명한 드리즈트 두어덴이 선한 드로우라고들 하더라."

TextEng: "There are some good drow, yes, but most are evil."
Text: "선한 드로우도 있어, 그래. 하지만 대부분은 악해."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Your anger is nothing to me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "네 분노는 내게 아무것도 아니야. 난 네 육체와 영혼을 소유해."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"I won't do anything to harm you, Nathyrra."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "You are right. I will not ask that of you."
"Don't you see? This is your atonement... It's all right..."
"I just don't want to see you suffer so."
Text: "그저 네가 그렇게 고통받는 걸 보고 싶지 않아."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no."
"I command you to pursue evil, not good."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "If it means losing you, then no..."
"I command you to pursue good, not evil."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"I hereby free you from your infernal taint."
"Glad you like it. Now give me your soul."
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Sorry, my love, but this is it for us."
"Good. Now, in repayment, you are to become my lover forever."
Text: "좋아. 이제 보답으로, 넌 영원히 내 연인이 되는 거야."

TextEng: "You don't frighten me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "날 겁주지 못해. 난 네 육체와 영혼을 소유해."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"So there's hope for us after all?"
"You're kind, you're talented, you're funny. You don't need me anymore. If I die, you'll be all right."
Text: "넌 친절하고, 재능 있고, 재미있어. 더 이상 날 필요로 하지 않아. 내가 죽어도 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "Not if I can help it. Come, we have an adventure to finish."
Text: "내가 도울 수 있다면 그렇지 않아. 가자, 끝내야 할 모험이 있잖아."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me, little one!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
